item.description: We are currently a group of 1 DM and 6 players that meet every Tuesday at 6:30-11or12pm. One of our regular players has vanished so we can use one more to fill the void. Looking for an experienced 3.5edition player. Campaign is set in Living Greyhawk. Details on character generation will follow with sign up. We meet in Lincoln, RI.
item.name: Regular Meetup Group, Can use 1 more!
